intro: This Product User Manual (PUM) serves as a technical guide for service providers involved in generating standardised land use and land cover (LU/LC) maps within the Copernicus Urban Atlas programme. Specifically, it provides mapping guidance and class descriptions for the Urban Atlas product, focusing on updates and extensions for the 2012 and 2018 reference years, covering nearly 800 Functional Urban Areas (FUAs) across the EU, EFTA, Western Balkans, the UK, and Turkey. The manual details product specifications, mapping conventions, and quality control procedures to ensure consistent and comparable outputs.
